channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ford looks to capitalize on AI, taking a page out of Tesla’s book
item.description: Ford sees a way to profit from the AI boom by playing more into energy storage. The move has worked well for Tesla.

item.title: Howard Stern and his 1 million listeners still have value for Sirius with contract extension
item.description: The terms of Stern’s deal were not disclosed, and while he commands a far smaller audience than in his heyday, it is still larger than most.

item.title: OK, boomer: Why you should start giving your money to your adult kids now
item.description: There’s no point in waiting until you die — especially in this economy. How to know how much you can part with.

item.title: Broadcom and these chip stocks make J.P. Morgan’s list of top picks
item.description: Fears of an AI bubble are likely here to stay. But a strong spending landscape means many semiconductor stocks can still thrive, according to J.P. Mor...

item.title: U.S. economy sags in December, S&P says, due to tariffs, inflation and softer sales
item.description: The U.S. economy stumbled at the end of the year, new surveys showed, as rising prices tied to tariffs reduced customer demand and spurred businesses ...

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
